#summary LayoutItem Description

= Introduction =

A LayoutItem is simply a configration holder for a specific video source


= Details =

Since a source can only have one configuration at a time, we need the LayoutItem to hold the desired configuration when the corresponding Layout will be activated.  

A LayoutItem will take care of:
  * Transision In
  * Transision Out
  * Position in X
  * Position in Y
  * Width
  * Height
  * Layer to show that source
